body: You gain a +2 enhancement bonus on Fly skill checks. This bonus increases by +1 for every five wizard levels you possess. In addition, you can cast feather fall on yourself at will. At 5th level, you can cast levitate on yourself at will. At 10th level, you can cast fly on yourself at will. At 20th level, whenever you make a Fly skill check, assume the roll resulted in a natural 20.
name: Air Supremacy
url: pfsrd://Advanced Players Guide/Rules/Core Classes/Wizard/Elemental Arcane Schools/Air School/Air Supremacy
